course_title: Introduction to French Literary Theory and Methodology

201.comments: A survey of basic terminology, methods, problems, and theoretical trends in French literary criticism, specifically designed to provide students with a foundation for advanced study of literature in French. Full course description: https://fhis.ubc.ca/course-description/fren371/

description: A survey of basic terminology, methods, problems, and theoretical trends in French literary criticism, specifically designed to provide students with a foundation for advanced study of literature in French.
